description:
Dragon won Big today. They were able to rack up points and play catch up but they are still behind in over all points by 412 points. Nightmare gets a 412 pt head start handicap in the finale.
Penny sees her opportunity to finally pounce on Syd's asshole. This may be the only chance Penny has to stick her dick in that hole.
Team Dragon takes turns sexually brutalizing Nightmare's body. They fist her, fuck her with a huge dong in her pussy and her ass then leave her in a pile of losers. Nightmare Vows to never lose again. We will see if they stay true to that vow in the finale.
title: Full Match July Tag TEam Match-up Everyone gets a hand in fucking Syd
